title: Idaho’s Abortion Travel Ban Shows Dangers of GOP’s “Parental Rights” Agenda
description:
The new law will punish anyone who helps a child obtain an abortion across state lines without parental consent.

The post Idaho’s Abortion Travel Ban Shows Dangers of GOP’s “Parental Rights” Agenda appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Pro-Israel Fund Manager Invested $500M in Israeli Arms Firm. Now Activist Investors Want Answers.
description:
Canada’s Scotiabank holds the largest foreign share of Elbit Systems, whose wares have been connected to rights abuses.

The post Pro-Israel Fund Manager Invested $500M in Israeli Arms Firm. Now Activist Investors Want Answers. appeared first on The Intercept.
